item.title: The Human Rights Benefits of Encryption
item.description: Authors: Andi Wilson Thompson Published: March 2015 URL: https://www.newamerica.org/oti/blog/the-human-rights-benefits-of-encryption/ Abstract: The Human Rights Benefits of Encryption is a blog post detailing public interest organizations’ efforts to have encryption recognized as a right by the UN Human Rights Council. This article describes submissions by a multitude of public interest organizations—including the ACLU, Human Rights Watch, and technology-specific organizations—and their arguments for the importance of encryption to free expression, privacy, and human rights.
